title: 90x25: Applicability of the Honoraria Ban to Compensation for Writing Works of Fiction
summary:
The honoraria ban likely does not apply to works of fiction, the publication of a book, or consulting fees for providing expert advice and opinions. 

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
